column5: Thanks for the resources I‚Äôll look into them now! It means a lot that you took the time to reply so thanks. Yeah I was on tablets, taking 5mg daily.. it wasn‚Äôt a lot of meds but it was incredibly debilitating to me.
I do that all the time it‚Äôs like you know me lol.

I don‚Äôt really have a good psych doc, idk if it‚Äôs the case with everywhere in the UK but my doctor changes all the time so I can‚Äôt really build a relationship with them. I don‚Äôt have any positive symptoms, mostly just side effects from the meds that I don‚Äôt like at all. I‚Äôm just a bit of a mess rn, but I appreciate you leaving a comment lol. Thanks though, it‚Äôs kinda hard to tell people that you feel suicidal and my dad definitely didn‚Äôt understand.
Yeah it definitely sucks, what‚Äôs worse is that I didn‚Äôt really get any help? I just got discharged after a day and there were no med changes.
Thank you. I‚Äôm doing okay, I‚Äôm struggling with the meds and stuff rn.
It‚Äôs worth a lot. I didn‚Äôt think I‚Äôd get such a response on here but I‚Äôm really surprised that I did. Looks like people care it‚Äôs really nice.
Lmao thank you, I don‚Äôt feel it these days anymore so the odd compliment is really appreciated :))

No I know that other people love and care about me, it‚Äôs just that now that I‚Äôm not psychotic I can see how much I put other people through when I am and I don‚Äôt want to live with medication and shit idk it‚Äôs just a lot to take on. 
I understand that I‚Äôm not the only one with schizophrenia that‚Äôs part of the reason why I‚Äôm here, to reach out and talk to other people with it so I can form a sort of network for myself.
Yeah I like baths that‚Äôs usually what my go to is.
Thanks a friend bought it for me :) appreciate it!
Sucks man hope you‚Äôre doing okay!
Hahaha I‚Äôm not sure if that‚Äôs exactly true but I appreciate the sentiment. Hope you‚Äôre okay!
Sooo good! Hope everything is good with you :)
üòç
I chortled hahahaha
Oh that‚Äôs some anime character can‚Äôt say I know much about that but thanks I think üòÖ
Sorry it wasn‚Äôt clear man it‚Äôs an old pic I‚Äôm through the psychosis rn
Should‚Äôve specified it‚Äôs an old picture I‚Äôm doing much better now :)
It‚Äôs an old pic I‚Äôm over the worst of it now. Thanks so much! :) xx
I should specify that this is an old picture and im no longer in psychosis lol sorry for any confusion.
I really love this kind of art
Happy for you!
Do you think you‚Äôd be able to get your hands on some sleeping tablets? They really help me. Hope you‚Äôre okay :(
What‚Äôs the show??
Sorry I only use mobile! Thanks for the link
your art looks amazing wth lmao
If you‚Äôre taking medication it could be it. Try resetting your sleeping pattern by setting an alarm clock for earlier in the day. That‚Äôs if you want to make it better.
Omg I love your art style I am OBSESSED
Are you not starving all the time! How could you only have one meal a day lol. I think I‚Äôm just going to cut out all carbs and go for walks. Meds just makes the weight stick to me.

I‚Äôm glad that you seem successful, I‚Äôve been worried that with this illness I won‚Äôt amount to anything. Which is a shame because I‚Äôm actually quite smart. Congratulations on the kids btw that‚Äôs huge! Idk what archons are.
How‚Äôs that working for you? I wish I could do that because my problem is without the meds I could go like 14 days without sleep and become psychotic.
This is so cool I love it
Irish actually so not far off lol!
Hahaha I think it‚Äôs just a flattering picture, I look a mess usually!
Yeah that‚Äôs why I posted! To hopefully connect and message other people going through the same thing as me. Thanks btw means a lot really low right now.
Oh shit another blue boy waddup. I‚Äôm good though! You?
Hahaha wow thanks :)
Ehhhh it‚Äôs been okay, I‚Äôm coming off one med and going onto another. Sleeping away most of it tbh, hopefully your weekend is much better.
Thanks wish I wasn‚Äôt schizoaffective cause then I‚Äôd actually have a chance at dating lmao
aw shucks thanks :)
That‚Äôs cool I don‚Äôt mind talking to you at all. Hope everything‚Äôs okay with you! You‚Äôve been dealing with this longer than me so you might be able to help me.
Hahahah dyeing your own clothes is cool, I‚Äôll call you purple as well then seeing as it‚Äôs your nickname!
Sounds really cool I could never dye my hair purple though I‚Äôd never be able to pull that off and I‚Äôm not that brave.

Omg thanks so much, tbh it‚Äôs a mess rn I dyed my hair when I was manic and it came out ginger rather than blonde lol. Getting it all cut off soon hopefully if I can manage to get out of bed for it lol.
Hey what‚Äôs up :)

Well that‚Äôs good that you have a good circle of friends that you can rely on- I don‚Äôt really have that anymore. Scizoaffective disorder kind of took that from me. I‚Äôm probably the worst case people have seen.

Omg I feel so sorry for you I couldn‚Äôt imagine going through school with this! It must be so tough. It only started for me when I was at university and that made me drop out. Hope everything is good with you though.

Hey I‚Äôm just seeing your reply- yes I come across like a complete zombie and I have no idea how to not come across that way. I‚Äôm getting a med change soon anyway so hopefully I‚Äôll be off this first gen antipsychotic and on something that agrees with me a little more.
I might talk to my psychiatrist about trying it out, thanks for taking the time to reply! :)
How do you find the invega sustenna? I‚Äôm looking to change meds for a period cause I‚Äôm currently on a first gen LAI.

Hi having read your post I think it wouldn‚Äôt be a bad idea to start antipsychotics- they‚Äôve definitely helped me to be where I am right now. I‚Äôve had really similar beliefs/ thoughts as well and the meds definitely help keep me grounded. 

I think the best thing would be to take them and review how you feel in a few months. Seems to me you might be having some delusional thinking along with mania. Hopefully things are better in the future!

I just hate the meds that come with psychosis, they‚Äôre the main culprit in me feeling less emotional. Also feel like they get rid of huge amounts of my personality which sucks so much. Anyway if you ever need someone to talk to I‚Äôm always open for chatting :)
